title: China’s reusable rocket race heats up with new hop test
summary: Launch startup iSpace has successfully launched and landed a test article, a month after a first hop test, as Chinese reusable rocket efforts intensify.

title: Helicity Space raises $5 million for fusion engine development
summary: Helicity Space, a California startup developing fusion engines, has raised $5 million in a seed funding round.

title: Space Force chief tempers expectations: ‘Go government fast, not SpaceX fast’
summary: Since its inception four years ago, the U.S. Space Force has faced congressional scrutiny and received numerous directives to transform the military’s space capabilities at warp speed.

title: Daily Telescope: Hubble images a dazzling star cluster 158,000 light-years away
summary: It is thousands of times more dense than our corner of the Milky Way Galaxy.

title: Polaris Dawn rescheduled for April
summary: The first flight of the Polaris program of private astronaut missions is now scheduled for no earlier than next April, a delay of nearly a year and a half from its original plan.
